main event: A cigar-shaped object was observed in Laurel, Maryland on June 8, 1962.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 9:30 PM on a clear night., The object was about 40 feet long and illuminated from within., The object moved very rapidly and silently., The observer noted the object made a very sharp turn before accelerating and disappearing., The observer reported the sighting immediately to the Laurel Police Department.
witness description: the observer was at home looking at the night sky
